description: Seemingly the most level headed out of the group, Rika seems to enjoy teasing others. A well known tom-boy, she excels in athletics and has been stated to be domineering. She is in the same grade as http://anidb.net/ch6556 [Ayumi]. She became close to tennis player http://anidb.net/ch6563 [Terai] when he started physical training with her, and over time became attracted to him, but didn`t give him that impression at first, thinking that was all there was to have a relationship.
name: Dobashi Rika
